com.opportunity.ui

Class CardImageLoader

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.opportunity.ui.CardImageLoader

  • public class CardImageLoader
extends java.lang.Object
    This class loads the card images for the Opportunity UI. See the instructions in OpportunityUI and on how to make use of the image loader methods defined in this class.
    Author:
    Ryan Dimaunahan and Lance Alcabasa
    See Also:
    OpportunityUI, ClickAction

    • Constructor Detail

      • CardImageLoader

        public CardImageLoader()
        Constructor that starts the image loading. This is called within OpportunityUI and should not be called instantiated elsewhere.
        See Also:
        OpportunityUI

    • Method Detail

      • getLargeImageIconFor

        public javax.swing.ImageIcon getLargeImageIconFor(int card)

        Gets the large image for the specified card. Used for the blowup card label. Use the constants specified in this class as parameter to this method.

        For example:

        this.getCardImageLoader().getLargeImageIconFor(CardImageLoader.KAREN_DAIRY_A_LVL0)
        Parameters:
        card - Card image that will be obtained. Please use the constants defined in this class.
        Returns:
        the ImageIcon of the Card

      • getMediumImageIconFor

        public javax.swing.ImageIcon getMediumImageIconFor(int card)

        Gets the medium sized image for the specified card. Used for the investments and prime investment card labels. Use the constants specified in this class as parameter to this method.

        For example:

        this.getCardImageLoader().getMediumImageIconFor(CardImageLoader.KAREN_DAIRY_A_LVL0)
        Parameters:
        card - Card image that will be obtained. Please use the constants defined in this class.
        Returns:
        the ImageIcon of the Card

      • getSmallImageIconFor

        public javax.swing.ImageIcon getSmallImageIconFor(int card)

        Gets the small sized image for the specified card. Use the constants specified in this class as parameter to this method.

        For example:

        this.getCardImageLoader().getSmallImageIconFor(CardImageLoader.KAREN_DAIRY_A_LVL0)
        Parameters:
        card - Card image that will be obtained. Please use the constants defined in this class.
        Returns:
        the ImageIcon of the Card
